MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH51 postcode area of Boness. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:23am. Our team have inspected the Corbiehall substation and have established an underground cable fault. We are now working to locate and repair the fault, and expect to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:21am on Friday, 12th March 2021
